channel.title: Notes on Notes to self
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on Notes to self

item.title: Books
item.description: A personal summary of books I have ready and/or am reading. I started doing this in the beginning of 2024. I may later add some books that I read prior. Habit Author: William James Reviewed on: 05 March 2024 William James was a philosopher who has written many books and essays. Habit is one of his essays and is available as a book which can be download for free from Google Books or archive.
